name: EvergreenSurvivalIdeas
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Survival skills will always come in handy, even if you are used to sitting comfortably on the sofa, in the car and office chair for most of your life. There are dozens interesting skills around: make an insulated shelter, make a shade shelter, find clean water, find other water sources, collect water from vegetation, light a fire, build a fire etc. Even if it never comes in handy in life, youll still have authority in the circle of friends. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
